text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
title: Untamed Wilds

flavor: Some say magic was first practiced by women, who have always felt strong ties to the land.
name: Verduran Enchantress
text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.
title: Verduran Enchantress

flavor:
After waking to the magic of Llanowar, no dreams can compare."
—Mirri of the Weatherlight
name: Vitalize
text: Untap all creatures you control.
title: Vitalize

flavor: The trees have ears, eyes, and teeth.
name: Waiting in the Weeds
text: Each player puts a 1/1 green Cat creature token onto the battlefield for each untapped Forest he or she controls.
title: Waiting in the Weeds

flavor:
Too much work—it takes a long time to break them in, and more than a few recruits."
—Grebog, goblin swine-rider
name: Warthog
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
title: Warthog

name: Wild Growth
text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
title: Wild Growth

flavor:
Aselbo soon had the rhino eating from his palm and the snake waiting at his heels."
—Afari, Tales
name: Worldly Tutor
text: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
title: Worldly Tutor

flavor:
When one wolf calls, others follow. Who wants to fight creatures that eat scorpions?"
—Maimun al-Wyluli, diary
name: Wyluli Wolf
text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
title: Wyluli Wolf

flavor:
. . . The magician drew a ring off his finger . . . , saying: 'It is a talisman against all evil, so long as you obey me.'"
—The Arabian Nights,
Junior Classics trans.
name: Aladdin's Ring
text: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
title: Aladdin's Ring

name: Amber Prison
text:
You may choose not to untap Amber Prison during your untap step.
{4}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. That permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Amber Prison remains tapped.
title: Amber Prison

flavor: Tawnos finally cracked the puzzle: the strange structures did not house Mishra's malevolent creations but were themselves among his creations.
name: Ankh of Mishra
text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
title: Ankh of Mishra

flavor: The Brothers' War scarred the land, but Ashnod left her mark in the bloodlines of those she tortured.
name: Ashnod's Altar
text: Sacrifice a creature: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.
title: Ashnod's Altar

name: Bottle of Suleiman
text: {1}, Sacrifice Bottle of Suleiman: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, put a 5/5 colorless Djinn artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield. If you lose the flip, Bottle of Suleiman deals 5 damage to you.
title: Bottle of Suleiman

name: Charcoal Diamond
text:
Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
title: Charcoal Diamond

name: Crystal Rod
text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
title: Crystal Rod

flavor:
Pass me from soul to soul, / soldier to herder, herder to beast, beast to soil / until I am everywhere. / Then pass me those souls.
—Totem inscription (translated)
name: Cursed Totem
text: Activated abilities of creatures can't be activated.
title: Cursed Totem

flavor: Bobbing merrily from opponent to opponent, the scimitar began adding playful little flourishes to its strokes; it even turned a couple of somersaults.
name: Dancing Scimitar
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
title: Dancing Scimitar

name: Dingus Egg
text: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
title: Dingus Egg

name: Disrupting Scepter
text: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.
title: Disrupting Scepter

flavor:
How is it the legged engines seem so much more alive than their wheeled counterparts? Simply, they were born, not made."
—Mishra
name: Dragon Engine
text: {2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
title: Dragon Engine

flavor:
With no further options, I was forced to don the mask."
—Rashida Scalebane
name: Dragon Mask
text: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
title: Dragon Mask

name: Fire Diamond
text:
Fire Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
title: Fire Diamond

name: Flying Carpet
text: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
title: Flying Carpet

flavor: The fountain had stood in the town square for centuries, but only the pigeons knew its secret.
name: Fountain of Youth
text: {2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.
title: Fountain of Youth

name: Glasses of Urza
text: {T}: Look at target player's hand.
title: Glasses of Urza

name: Grinning Totem
text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.
title: Grinning Totem

name: Howling Mine
text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.
title: Howling Mine

name: Iron Star
text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
title: Iron Star

name: Ivory Cup
text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
title: Ivory Cup

name: Jade Monolith
text: {1}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that source deals that damage to you instead.
title: Jade Monolith

flavor: This timeworn relic was responsible for many of Urza's victories, though he never fully comprehended its mystic runes.
name: Jalum Tome
text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
title: Jalum Tome

name: Jayemdae Tome
text: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.
title: Jayemdae Tome

flavor: Slow and heavy swings the club.
name: Lead Golem
text: Whenever Lead Golem attacks, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
title: Lead Golem

name: Mana Prism
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
title: Mana Prism

name: Marble Diamond
text:
Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
title: Marble Diamond

flavor: When the mighty sleep, the lowly prowl.
name: Meekstone
text: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
title: Meekstone

flavor: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.
name: Millstone
text: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
title: Millstone

name: Moss Diamond
text:
Moss Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
title: Moss Diamond

name: Mystic Compass
text: {1}, {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
title: Mystic Compass

flavor:
The foot stone is connected to the ankle stone, the ankle stone is connected to the leg stone . . . ."
—"Song of the Artificer
name: Obsianus Golem
title: Obsianus Golem

flavor:
It has been my honor to improve on the Thran's original design. Perhaps history will remember me in some small part for my work."
—Urza, in his apprenticeship
name: Ornithopter
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
title: Ornithopter

flavor: It scattered falcons like a lion hunting among jackals.
name: Patagia Golem
text: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.
title: Patagia Golem

flavor: A mirror, a shield, a promise, a great distance, and a kind word—five ways to avoid harm.
name: Pentagram of the Ages
text: {4}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
title: Pentagram of the Ages

flavor:
The secrets of Phyrexia are expensive. You will pay in brass and bone, steel and sinew."
—Kaervek
name: Phyrexian Vault
text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
title: Phyrexian Vault

name: Primal Clay
text: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)
title: Primal Clay

name: Rod of Ruin
text: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
title: Rod of Ruin

flavor:
What manner of fiend would design such a sadistic device?"
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic
name: Skull Catapult
text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
title: Skull Catapult

name: Sky Diamond
text:
Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
title: Sky Diamond

flavor:
Uh, does anyone have a flute?"
—Rana, Suq'Ata market fool
name: Snake Basket
text: {X}, Sacrifice Snake Basket: Put X 1/1 green Snake creature tokens onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
title: Snake Basket

name: Soul Net
text: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
title: Soul Net

name: Storm Cauldron
text:
Each player may play an additional land during each of his or her turns.
Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.
title: Storm Cauldron

name: Teferi's Puzzle Box
text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in his or her hand on the bottom of his or her library in any order, then draws that many cards.
title: Teferi's Puzzle Box

flavor: Mouths and wings beyond numbering, but a single mind to guide them.
name: The Hive
text: {5}, {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp onto the battlefield. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
title: The Hive

name: Throne of Bone
text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
title: Throne of Bone

flavor: You'll never miss what you never had.
name: Wand of Denial
text: {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. If it's a nonland card, you may pay 2 life. If you do, put it into that player's graveyard.
title: Wand of Denial

name: Wooden Sphere
text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
title: Wooden Sphere

name: Adarkar Wastes
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.
title: Adarkar Wastes

name: Brushland
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.
title: Brushland

name: City of Brass
text:
Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
title: City of Brass

name: Crystal Vein
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Crystal Vein: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.
title: Crystal Vein

name: Dwarven Ruins
text:
Dwarven Ruins enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Dwarven Ruins: Add {R}{R} to your mana pool.
title: Dwarven Ruins

name: Ebon Stronghold
text:
Ebon Stronghold enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Ebon Stronghold: Add {B}{B} to your mana pool.
title: Ebon Stronghold

name: Havenwood Battleground
text:
Havenwood Battleground enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Havenwood Battleground: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.
title: Havenwood Battleground

name: Karplusan Forest
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.
title: Karplusan Forest

name: Ruins of Trokair
text:
Ruins of Trokair enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Ruins of Trokair: Add {W}{W} to your mana pool.
title: Ruins of Trokair

name: Sulfurous Springs
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.
title: Sulfurous Springs

name: Svyelunite Temple
text:
Svyelunite Temple enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Svyelunite Temple: Add {U}{U} to your mana pool.
title: Svyelunite Temple

name: Underground River
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.
title: Underground River
